title: Virtual YouTuber Dennou Shojo Siro Official Comic Anthology
description:
After surpassing 450,000 subscribers on her channel, the virtual YouTuber "Dennou Shoujo Siro" is finally getting her own manga!
A large selection of every day life slapstick comedy with Baacharu and the Sirogumi? Don't miss out!

Youtube Channel: [url]https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLhUvJ_wO9hOvv_yYENu4fQ[/url]
